name: Userstyles.org  >>  Elegant blue
description:
This style is mod of style 1210 by user 667

Main features:
  1.	"Smart" screenshots
  2.	Three-column numbered display of lists of styles. 

I would like to mention following users:
user 15203 , user 15901 , user 4241 , user 552 (and his style 1029 for ideas).
________________________________________________________
Also take a look at style 12497, style 16488, style 16680, to add some optional features to this style.
